{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20540v1", "title": "Spin Wave Dispersion of the van der Waals Antiferromagnet NiPS$_3$", "summary": "We calculate the magnon dispersion spectra of the two-dimensional zigzag van
der Waals antiferromagnet NiPS$_3$ for monolayer, bilayer, and bulk systems as
a function of an external magnetic field. We calculate the exchange and
anisotropy constants in our spin model by first principles. We can accurately
explain the transition from a collinear to a canted ground state for a magnetic
field applied normal to the (in-plane) easy-axis, and a spin-flop transition
when the field is parallel to it. A topologically protected Dirac nodal line is
present and robust with respect to both external and anisotropy fields.", "main_category": "cond-mat.mes-hall", "categories": "cond-mat.mes-hall", "published": "2025-04-29T08:34:24Z"}
